release.note: Results: Check only selected items when checking add to list
Result: Applied span2/span3 switch for refine results when window width is less/greater than 1200
Result: Added Auto Suggest feature.
Result: Added Date Slider.
Result: Added buttons to apply and clear date limiter.
Result: Removed RSS settings which were for koha instead of EDS.
Result: Better placement of exact match placard.
Result: Moved Research starter CSS to stylesheet.
Result: Break long URLs to ensure layout responsiveness.
Result: Refine section clean up and cosmetics.
Result: Alert user to deselect titles from discovery to add to list.
Details: Removed Marc view.
Cart: Fixed addition of catalogue items for hold and list from EDS
Results: Removed breadcrumb from to page
Details: Removed breadcrumb from to page
Advanced: Removed breadcrumb from to page
Admin: Removed Prog from setup tool
Admin: Pointed release notes to sha/3.22.json
Admin: Updated setup.tt with new opac-sendbasket.pl patch info
Admin: Updated setup.tt with new doc-head-close.inc patch info
Admin: Applied prettify to patch code section in run tool section
Prog: Removed prog folder and all its contents as this template was removed
Cart: Override Place Hold to prompt users to remove titles from discovery
Cart: Override Add to List to prompt users to remove titles from discovery
Cart: Call enableCheckboxActions(); on .cb click for Discovery items too
Cart: Removed function EDSSendBasket() - legacy to control EDS items in cart when add to cart was an optional patch
Cart: Removed bibListLocal - used for legacy cart patch
Cart: Removed edsListLocal - used for legacy cart patch
Js: Removed $(document).ready(); made redundant by trackCall
Js: Preload EDS Select Text and Default Search from the script tag to remove delays loading EDS options to the dropdown.
Js: Fix position of search switch message to appear just below the dropdown.
Results: Select field code by default if set in bootstrap theme.
Create AuthToken if session token request is incomplete
